case.title: Beautiful Black Slim Woman For Mature White Male - 45 (NYC area )
case.text:
I'm a beautiful Black woman seeking a mature white male for friendship leading to more. This is for a real relationship. I'm not looking for a one night stand. I'm 5 7" 125 pds., slim but shapely. Age is not a issue with me, the older the better. With age comes wisdom. Must be financially secure and be prepared to have fun. Let's travel and explore all that life has to offer. Tomorrow is not promised to anyone. Tell me your age, height, weight and location. Don't ask me to Google or Facebook you. Must send me a current PICTURE of yourself with your email. Please be fully clothed. I will send you my pic too. You will not be disappointed.
(((((Big Hug)))))
